env.info: (hold 0) (plate 14) (at 0 5) (sort 1 worktable) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 closet) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (type 2 container) (closed 2) (sort 3 microwave) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (opened 3) (sort 4 plant) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 sofa) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 human) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 teapoy) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (sort 8 can) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (sort 9 can) (size 9 small) (color 9 green) (sort 10 can) (size 10 small) (color 10 black) (sort 11 can) (size 11 small) (color 11 white) (sort 12 bottle) (size 12 small) (color 12 red) (sort 13 bottle) (size 13 small) (color 13 blue) (sort 14 book) (size 14 small) (color 14 red) (sort 15 book) (size 15 small) (color 15 yellow)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet) (type X container)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y sofa))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y teapoy))) )
test.nl: There must not be closet is opened. The black can must be in microwave. Please put the white can on the sofa. Give a can to human. Please put the yellow book in the microwave. Please put a book in microwave. Close the door of microwave. Please put a bottle on teapoy.
